main event: A circular object with a plastic dome was observed in Juniata, Pennsylvania on August 27, 1956.
interesting points: The object was about 23 feet in diameter and had a very bright light that illuminated the observer's back yard., The object gained an estimated altitude of 20,000 feet., The object moved north at a high rate of speed., The observation lasted for 60 seconds., The object faded out of sight after being visually tracked for three minutes.
sighted object: one circular object with a plastic dome
